title: ANOTHER WARLORD JIMBEI! - One Piece Episode 430 and 431 - Rich Reaction
author: AJ Rich
description: Reaction video covering One Piece episodes 430 and 431, featuring commentary on the introduction of Saldeath, the descent to Level 3, and the reappearance of Bentham. Includes reaction at 11:17 for Episode 431 and review/analysis at 20:21.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through Episode 431 of the Impel Down arc

title: WARLORD JIMBEI!! (ALSO BON CLAY!?) - One Piece Episode 430 & 431 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown
description: Combined reaction and review video for episodes 430 and 431, highlighting the appearance of Bentham (Bon Clay) on Level 3 and discussion of Jinbe.

title: ACE AND JINBE!! | One Piece Episode 430/431 Reaction
author: Unknown
description: Reaction video covering episodes 430 and 431, focusing on the storylines involving Ace and Jinbe's connection, as well as Luffy's progress through Impel Down.

title: The Jump Festa Zombiecast [Part One]
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: Episode #61 of The One Piece Podcast covering Episode 431 and the events at Impel Down Level 3, recorded on the same day as the episode's Japanese air date.

title: 431: "Chief Jailer Saldeath's Trap! Level 3 - Starvation Hell!"
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: Blog post recap and commentary on Episode 431, discussing the introduction of Level 3, Saldeath's tactics, and the reappearance of Bentham.

title: One Piece's Impel Down Prison, Explained
author: CBR
description: Comprehensive article explaining the structure and levels of Impel Down prison, including detailed information about Level 3 - Starvation Hell and its harsh conditions.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about all levels of Impel Down

title: One Piece: Impel Down Prison, Explained
author: Game Rant
description: Detailed explanation of Impel Down's structure, security measures, and the different levels including Level 3's extreme conditions and prisoner treatment.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about Impel Down arc
